messages.subject: spare a thought...
messages.msgSnippet: PLEASE!!  for those poor souls on digest!!!  I was off for a week last week (was it quiet?  oh, no, Sandra was back *grin* you can e- bop me if you want,
messages.messageBody:
PLEASE!! for those poor souls on digest!!! I was off for a week
last week (was it quiet? oh, no, Sandra was back *grin* you can e-
bop me if you want, Sandra LOL) and had my mail set to daily
digest (being utterly unable to go without my mail lists, and just
plain nosy!) It's really hard to have to scan through several hundred
(no I don't think I'm exaggerating) messages in digests when they
have all the yahoo blurb repeated at the bottom and the whole of
someone else's huuuuge post as well.

I now have over 480 emails in my unschooling-dotcom folder and
some of those are still digests. Gonna take me a while to catch
up, my you've been busy!!!

Keep it up, but please remember to cut stuff down when you're
replying!

Tracy
